title:
Walker's Razor Slim Earmuffs; Dynamic shooting range high-definition speakers; sound-activated compression reaction of 0.02 seconds with independent volume controls;
Noise reduction 23 dB; 2 omnidirectional microphones; audio input jack; recessed volume control knobs; 2 AAA batteries (included); size: 8.10 x 4.60 x 10.60 inches; weight: 0.98 pounds
descriptions:
Walker’s Razor Slim Earmuffs – reliable hearing protection built for the range.

- Clear, natural audio: Dynamic HD speakers tuned for low-noise clarity.
- Fast protection: Sound-activated compression reacts in 0.02 seconds.
- NRR 23 dB: Two omnidirectional mics capture ambient sound while cutting harmful noise.
- Easy control: Independent, recessed volume knobs; 3.5 mm audio input jack.
- Ready to go: Includes 2 AAA batteries; durable composite housing.
- Comfortable and compact: Padded headband with metal wire frame folds for storage.
- Size/weight: 8.10 x 4.60 x 10.60 in; 0.98 lb.

Stay aware, stay protected, and keep shooting comfortably with Razor Slim.
generation_prompt_text:
Write an advertising description for the following product. Use the existing description below as a guideline, matching it roughly in quality and level of detail. Do not include information not available in the description below. Do not directly plagiarize the description below. Be concise and informative. Assume potential buyers who read the ad have access to a photo of the product, and are scanning through many different similar advertisements, spending little time on each, and that they value being able to quickly see the most important details.

---

Title: Walker's Razor Slim Earmuffs; Dynamic shooting range high-definition speakers; sound-activated compression reaction of 0.02 seconds with independent volume controls;
Noise reduction 23 dB; 2 omnidirectional microphones; audio input jack; recessed volume control knobs; 2 AAA batteries (included); size: 8.10 x 4.60 x 10.60 inches; weight: 0.98 pounds

Description: Walker's Razor Slim Earmuffs


Protect your hearing at the shooting range with Walker's Razor Slim Protection Ear Muff with low noise/frequency tuned for natural sound clarity and added safety

Dynamic shooting range high-definition speakers for clear sound with sound-activated compression reaction of 0.02 seconds with independent volume controls

Noise reduction rating of 23 dB with 2 omnidirectional microphones and includes an audio input jack and recessed volume control knobs plus composite housing for effective sound dampening

Comfortable headband with a metal wire frame that folds for easy storage and operates on 2 AAA batteries that are already included in the package so it is ready out-of-the-box

Easy to use and comfortable to wear that measures 8.10 x 4.60 x 10.60 inches and weighs 0.98 pounds so you cannot feel the heaviness of the ear protection when shooting
